A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To me it felt like the story was written by multiple writers who didn't speak to one another. There is a significant plot hole later in the movie.  This snafu was previously explained but should not occur at this point in the movie.  This movie felt like a number of short stories tied in together.  I understand that the overall theme of the movie is that failure can lead to a spark of hope. Maybe episode 9 will be that hope.
